info.title: REST API for recipes sharing
info.description: API provides CRUD operations for Recipes App with User authorization features

tags.name: Api
tags.description: Operations with Recipes, Categories and Ingredients

get.description: Returns list of ingredients by query string

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: any substring that ingredient name includes

get.description:
Returns recipes list in accordance with query parameters
At least 1 query parameter is required

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: substring in category name of recipes

post.description: Adds a new recipe by authorized user

delete.description: Deletes recipe by authorized user (only own recipes)

put.description: Change recipe favorite status for current user
